[Launch App](https://defi.therecharge.io/)

**The Recharge**

A decentralized incentive solution that connects electric-charging platforms.

The Recharge aims to provide a long-term sustainable decentralized ecosystem
that can help maximize participating usersâ incentives

[Launch App](https://defi.therecharge.io/)

## About**How It Works**

  * Charging Station
  * Recharge Swap
  * Ecosystem
  * Recharge Virtuous Cycle

A decentralized incentive solution that is built to offer a full range of De-
Fi services to help maximize userâs incentives

![](/static/media/img_about01.250b514b.png)![](/static/media/img_about01-m.adb40880.png)

Cross-chain bridge to facilitate Recharge Token to move from one to another.
Recharge Swap is compatible with Ethereum, BSC, HECO and Solana

![](/static/media/img_about02.54209770.png)![](/static/media/img_about02-m.7c9acb59.png)

The Recharge ecosystem connects electric-charging platforms with the
decentralized incentive solution, Charging Station. Participating users can
experience optimized incentivizing journey through multi-chain supporting
cross- chain, Recharge Swap.

![](/static/media/img_about03.50127013.png)![](/static/media/img_about03-m.0fe6c5fc.png)

The Recharge ecosystem connects electric-charging platforms with the
decentralized incentive solution, Charging Station. Participating users can
experience optimized incentivizing journey through multi-chain supporting
cross- chain, Recharge Swap.

![](/static/media/img_about04.f0981f71.png)![](/static/media/img_about04-m.43534238.png)

## Recharge Token**Features**

  * ![](/static/media/img_features01.3297721a.png)

**Frequent Use Point**

Frequent Use Point (FUP) is designed to reward regular users on the Recharge
Ecosystem. Any payment made in the Recharge connected services will provide
Frequent User Point on a pro rata basis. FUP is switchable with Recharge Token
on a station in Recharge Ecosystem.

  * ![](/static/media/img_features02.41c1a0bd.png)

**Automated Carbon Redemption**

Every transaction of Recharge token regardless of mainnet will trigger
Automated Carbon Redemption (ACR) to incentive center. Accumulated Carbon
Redemption will be distributed to boost Recharge Virtuous Cycle and to
purchase Carbon Credit.

  * ![](/static/media/img_features03.0c01911f.png)

**Recharge Governance**

 _Recharge Governance is designed for Recharge Ecosystem Contributors to shape
the future of the protocols. Recharge holders can influence decision
concerning the Recharge Ecosystem such as proposals and decision makings on
shaping the ecosystem._

  * ![](/static/media/img_features04.638b4d0a.png)

**Cross Chain Compatibility**

 _Recharge are deployed on various major protocols to help boost its ecosystem
Recharge Swap(Cross Chain Bridge) in the first phase, supports ERC-20, HRC-20,
BEP-20 and SOL_

## **NFT**

![](data:image/png;base64,)

**The Recharge - NFT**

The Recharge NFT provides unique digital arts created on Solana Network and it
does offer very attractive and unique benefits. Also, The Recharge NFT will
have unique attributes in utilities to boost The Recharge Ecosystem.

[Go to The Recharge NFT](https://nft.therecharge.io/)
